greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = binomial(2*n, n+1) + 1.
formula: Let G(x) = (1-3*x)/(2*(x-1)*x) + (I*(1-2*x))/(2*x*sqrt(4*x-1)) with Im(x) > 0, then a(n) = [x^n] G(x). The generating function G(x) satisfies the differential equation 6*x^3 - 4*x + 1 = (8*x^5 - 22*x^4 + 21*x^3 - 8*x^2 + x)*diff(G(x), x) + (4*x^4 - 14*x^3 + 17*x^2 - 8*x + 1)*G(x).
maple: aList := proc(len) local gf, ser; assume(Im(x) > 0);
seq(coeff(ser, x, n), n=0..len) end: aList(27);
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Feb 12 2019
